description: DopplerProvider configures a store to sync secrets using the Doppler provider. Project and Config are required if not using a Service Token.

auth.description: Auth configures how the Operator authenticates with the Doppler API

config.description: Doppler config (required if not using a Service Token)

format.description: Format enables the downloading of secrets as a file (string)

nameTransformer.description: Environment variable compatible name transforms that change secret names to a different format

project.description: Doppler project (required if not using a Service Token)
